seed_pair.target: Les gustaría amarse pero están infelices.
seed_pair.known: They would like to love each other but they're unhappy.

S0416: Quieren liderar el camino el próximo año.
They want to lead the way next year.
S0417: Do they want to kill those ants?
S0418: They need to serve the community.
S0419: Si quieren que la gente los quiera.
If they want people to like them.
S0420: No necesitan preguntar cuántos años tiene.
They don't need to ask how old he is.
S0421: Porque ya saben que se está poniendo débil.
Because they already know he's getting weak.
S0423: Do they need to ask such an obvious question?
S0424: No están perdiendo el tiempo de todos.
S0425: Sí necesitan asegurarse de que entienden.
Yes they need to make sure they understand.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
